name: emi.cluster
description: glite-CLUSTER is a node type that can publish information about clusters and subclusters in a site, referenced by any number of compute elements.
releaseNotes:
What's new:

    * This is the first release of the gLite CLUSTER



Deployment notes:

    * installation: yum install emi-cluster

    * configuration: your_path/yaim -c -s site-info.def -n CLUSTER

    * for more information on various configuration scenarious see http://wiki.italiangrid.org/twiki/bin/view/CREAM/SystemAdministratorGuideForEMI1



Known Issues:

    * none
changeLog: Put the Change logs here (multiline field)
